judges: HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. KANNAN . Whether Reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the judgment
judgment_text:
IN THE HIGH COURT FOR THE STATES OF PUNJAB AND HARYANA AT
CHANDIGARH
FAO No.186 of 1995
Date of Decision.15.03.2013
.
FAO No.187 of 1995
Smt. Indra Chaudhary widow of Shri Ramesh Chander Chaudhary,
Resident of R-302, Model Town, Karnal 
.....Appellant
Versus
State of Haryana through Secretary Transport, Govt. of Haryana,
Chandigarh and others
.......Respondents
Present: 
Mr. Kunal Mulwani, Advocate for 
Mr. Chetan Mittal, Senior Advocate 
for the appellants.
Mr. Kunal Garg, AAG, Haryana 
for respondent Nos.1 and 2.
Mr. Inderjit Sharma, Advocate 
for respondent No.6.
CORAM:HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE K. KANNAN
. Whether Reporters of local papers may be allowed to see the
judgment ? No
. 
To be referred to the Reporters or not ? No
. Whether the judgment should be reported in the Digest? No
-.-
K. KANNAN J.(ORAL)
.
Learned counsel for the appellant states that the matter has
been settled before the Lok Adalat and would not require any
adjudication from this Court.
.
Both the appeals are disposed of in view of the settlement
arrived at before the Lok Adalat.
(K. KANNAN)
 JUDGE 
March 15, 2013
Pankaj*
